name: Octa Obby
description:
For eleven years, the Octa has orbited the planet of Zarloptopiarnolus(Hope that's not copy-righted), being launched in 2046 from Mars on an expedition to find colonizable planets outside the solar system. Four days after the ship's eleven-year anniversary, a comet struck. The ship was divided into eight parts, scattered all over space. 

-

Your goal is to reconnect the parts, using a very strong kind of tape. And of course, there's also a time limit. you have not more than five minutes before the tape starts rewinding(<an excuse for frame-rate management(created with Unity's trial system)).

-

Note: This is my first ever published game, so I'd greatly appreciate any suggestions or positive feedback.
